title: Citrus Spritzer (Easy LaCroix Tangerine and Campari Cocktail) Recipe
full_text:
Citrus Spritzer (Easy LaCroix Tangerine and Campari Cocktail) Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
(
45
ml
)
Campari
3/4
ounce
(
20
ml
)
simple syrup
(see note)
1/2
ounce
(
15
ml
)
fresh juice
from
1
whole
lime
1/2
ounce
(
15
ml
)
fresh juice
from
1
whole
orange
3
ounces
(
90
ml
)
LaCroix Tangerine Sparkling Water
Lime wheel
, for garnish (optional)
Directions
Add Campari, simple syrup, lime juice, and orange juice to a large wine glass. Fill glass 2/3 full with ice and stir to mix. Top with LaCroix Tangerine, stir gently, and serve immediately, garnished with a lime wheel if desired.
Notes
To make simple syrup, combine 1 cup water with 1 cup sugar in a small saucepan and heat over medium heat, stirring constantly, until sugar is dissolved. Cool before using. Simple syrup will keep in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
